about_the_game:
DLC INCLUDES:
- A seven-track soundtrack sampler by Hydelic, including the fan-favorite song “Connected (Yours Forever)”
- Eleven 4k Desktop Wallpapers
- Seven Tetris Effect Profile Avatars

1. Boscage [Radio Edit]

3. Look Up [Radio Edit]
4. Connected (Yours Forever) [Trailer Edit]

7. New Beginnings [Radio Edit]
